snippet: Chipotle Mexican Grill told its nearly 60,000 employees what measures it was taking to improve food safety and to gain back trust after widespread reports of foodborne illnesses.
abstract: Chipotle Mexican Grill closes its more than 2,000 restaurants for four hours to conduct 'virtual' town hall meeting with more than 50,000 employees about what it is doing to increase food safety and restore customers' trust; more than 500 customers since July have become sick from e Coli and other contamination.
lead_paragraph: Chipotle Mexican Grill told its nearly 60,000 employees what measures it was taking to improve food safety and to gain back trust after widespread reports of foodborne illnesses.

headline.main: Chipotle Meeting Outlines Food Safety to Workers and Message for Public
